s.
Met Need for EmONC
The met need for EmONC is the proportion of 
all women with major obstetric complications 
who are treated in EmONC facilities. It is 
an indicator of whether the coverage and 
use of EmONC services are adequate. WHO 
recommends use of the met need indicator in 
two settings: all health facilities and EmONC 
facilities (World Health Organization, 2009).
The numerator for this indicator is women 
admitted with or who develop direct or major 
obstetric complications while del
